Please refer to root directory and /Help for the license agreement and documention pertaining to the files herein.

This sample demonstrates the distributed object and memory system in Raknet.  The distributed object system source files are available only to registered users.  You can register at http://www.rakkarsoft.com

To build, just include DistributedNetworkObject.cpp along with the distribution network files and library as specified in the documentation
